title: 820-2532 Starts i SM Bypass mode only
message:
Hi guys,

I have an 820-2532 board that came without PPBUS_G3H
The ISL had an "hole" "impact" on it, because it blew up, then i replaced it.

Now
PPBUS_G3H is OK: 12.26V
PP1V05_S5_MCP: 1.08V

Pin 9 and 15 of U7000:
CHGR_AMON: 0.034V
CHGR_BMON:0.034V

As it turn on in SMC bypass mode I've also checked the main S5 sensors rails:
SMC_CPU_HI_ISENSE: 0.003V
SMC_CPU_FSB_ISENSE: 0V
SMC_BATT_ISENSE: 0.030V
SMC_PBUS_VSENSE: 0V
SMC_DCIN_ISENSE: 0.031V

Q5315 voltages:
1: GND
2: PBUSVSENS_EN: 0V
3: PPBUS_G3H_VSENSE: 0V
4: PPBUS_G3H: 12.26
5: PBUSVSENS_EN_DIV : 12.14V
6: PBUSVSENS_EN_L: 12.02V

Best Regards
